mapper.select: select * from user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.update: update board set board_del='0' where board_no=#{no} and board_del='1'
mapper.select: select board_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_write, board_date, board_like, board_count, board_del from board where board_no = #{no} and board_del = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into likes(user_no, board_no, com_no, reply_no) values (#{user_no}, #{board_no}, #{com_no}, #{reply_no})
mapper.delete: delete from likes where user_no=#{user_no} and board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_no, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_write) values (#{user_no},#{board_title}, #{board_content}, now(), #{board_write})
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where board_no = #{no} and com_del = '1'
select comment.*, user.user_username from comment, user where comment.board_no = #{no} and comment.com_del = '1' and user.user_no=comment.user_no order by comment.com_cdate
mapper.insert: insert into comment(user_no, board_no, com_comment) values (#{user_no}, #{board_no}, #{com_comment})
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, board_like, board_count, (board_like+board_count) as board_react from board where category!=0 and board_del='1' order by board_react desc limit 10
select board_no, board_title, board_like, board_count, board_date from board where category!=0 and board_del='1' order by board_no desc limit 5
select board_no, board_title, board_like, board_count, board_date from board where category=0 and board_del='1' order by board_no desc limit 5
select board_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_write, board_date, board_like, board_count, board_del from board where board_del = '1' order by board_no desc
select board_no from board where board_no < #{no} and board_del = '1' order by board_no desc limit 1
select board_no from board where board_no > #{no} and board_del = '1' order by board_no asc limit 1

select board_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_write, board_date, board_like, board_count, board_del from board where board_del = '1' and (board_title like #{keyword} or board_content like #{keyword}) order by board_no desc
